column1: In which season are 'Loos' common? (south-west monsoon/winter/summer)
Which are the summer months in India? (March to May/ May to June/ April to June)
Which of the following states recieves snow in winter? (Bihar/Himachal Pradesh/Tamil Nadu)
Which climate do the areas lying south of the Tropic of Cancer have? (temperate/ tropical/ coastal)
What kind of climate would a place just near the seas have? (moderate/ extreme/ tropical)
